name: LOST (itch) (Saahil Talha)
description:
LOST - A platformer with two endings.

Should be pretty self-explanatory.

It is just a platformer, after all.

Credits are for when you finish the game ;) 

Also, a little tip: If you seem to be not going anywhere, try going a different way...

Please refrain from commenting on spoiler-y information. Please.

No, seriously. Any spoiler-y things on how to beat this will be deleted. I want you all to feel the amazing feeling that comes with not giving up, persisting, and eventually succeeding. Don't rob yourself or anyone else of this feeling.
